website_summaries.verdict: A good bench to act as a focal point in an entryway or room in the home.
pros: Cross bracing adds both functionality and visual appeal
Lower bench shelf is large enough for several small objects
cons: Difficult to rearrange due to weight

customer_reviews.title: Overall good construction and design but needs to provide stronger cam locks.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my basement entryway, the shipment speed was very fast, everything came within 1 box which you would need a handcart to move around if you are alone. The overall construction of the product was pretty strong, however, I would recommend them to make sure they label all their pcs properly. I ran into problem during assembling because someone had mislabeled the E and F pcs which required me to dissemble some parts which resulted in broken cam locks. I contacted their customer service department the rep was very nice over the phone and send over my requested replacement parts within 1 week. Overall I am satisfied with this product hopefully it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ML329

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and functional! Easy assembly, I was able to put it together in under an hour mostly by myself with a little help from my son. I love the versatility of sit/stand!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Tv stand- not sturdy and broken!
customer_reviews.text: NOT pleased with this purchase!! Seriously... for $400 you'd think that it'd be a little more sturdy (very wobbly.) and it's broken in several places. Too bad, because it's a beautiful piece but the quality is crap! Spend a couple hundred dollars more and get something better quality. Learn from my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Nr5683

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, beautiful and a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I loved the photos of the entryway coat rack but was skeptical after reading some of the reviews. I went ahead and bought it anyways and I am so glad we did!!! This item is very sturdy and well made. It took my husband and I a little over 2 hours with a small break. We did run into a couple of snags with the nails fitting but we persevered and we’re able to get them in the right places. We received a lot of compliments and the initial cost guess was always $600+ !!! So happy with the purchase. Exactly what we hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Rania

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a large computer armoire that we no longer needed because all we have now are laptops. I really like it. It was very easy to assemble...a big requirement for me. All you have to do it attach the legs. It is a great size, not too big. The color matched my other furniture in the family room. It is sort of a grayish tone. Overall great quality for the price. Very sturdy. The drawer is shallow. Won't hold much but pens, etc. But that's all I needed. Others have mentioned a chemical smell but I never noticed anything.
customer_reviews.author: Ruffin Morgan

customer_reviews.title: The desk is easy to put together (comes in two parts)
customer_reviews.text: Delivery takes a bit, but it is free with prime, so no real complaints on that. The desk is easy to put together (comes in two parts); takes about 30 mins. The quality is fantastic and the look amazing. If you’re in the market for a hybrid desk (standing and sitting) this is a very good option
customer_reviews.author: Shanny

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This desk came earlier than expected. Beautiful finish and shade. It looks much better than the pics. Simple to put together and took less than 30 minutes. No parts were missing or any damage. Very well packaged. If your hesitating about this purchase, don’t hesitate any longer. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Castiglia

customer_reviews.title: defective product is shipped
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it. Nice product but no quality control. Damaged parts inside the box. I found those during assembly. First damage was on the back side, so did not care. 2nd on is one of decorative black button piece is ripped of. Saw it almost towards the end of the installation. I am not going to disassemble and go through repackaging trouble to return. So just have to live with it unless amazon would take the full assembled product back. Anyway..DONT BUY IT... Update: Wrong locking screw. Could not finish installation. Amazon now shipping replacement product. Good customer service by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sifat J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get replacement parts for parts received damaged
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this desk because I liked the style and color. When I received the shipment, there was no damage to the box, but the corner of the desktop was damaged. I reported this thru their website, and within one week I received a shipment with a new desktop. Their easy to use reporting for replacement parts took less than five minutes to complete. They followed up with emails that they received my request followed by an email the next day that they’re sending replacement parts with a FedEx tracking number. New desktop was received without any signs of damage.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Braasch

customer_reviews.title: Dont ask for replacement parts, you won't get them
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved and a few screws and the support brackets were misplaced, I called and asked if I could pay for a replace pack of hardware to be sent to me (totally not expecting to get them for free). I was told that it wasn't possible because "its imported", so this piece of furniture is completely useless or I'll have to DIY it back together. Its a decent piece of furniture just be warned the top part was flimsy from the beginning, it wobbled and leaned if you placed too many things on the hooks, its not THE best one out there and not what you'd expect for the price paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Stons

customer_reviews.title: Predrilled holes in vertical supports can be 100% hidden by furniture finish.
customer_reviews.text: Table was pretty good, but the pre-driilled holes in the vertical supports that the bottom shelf is supposed to fit into came covered in wood finish so they gave the illusion that they weren't drilled. So I went out and bought calipers and drill bits, and used measurements I got off of the 2 ends tables I bought to measure out where to drill the holes on the coffee table. Of course when I finally find center, my drill bit pokes right through the finish like rice paper and there are the holes! So if this happens to you, the holes are there, they've just been covered by finish.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: High quality product for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: For furniture that comes in a box and you assemble yourself, this is some of the best I've ever seen. The crews/camlocks, etc are all good quality, the item comes relatively assembled already, the screw holes all lined up correctly, no missing or damaged pieces. The items feel incredibly sturdy right out of the box and after assembly. The light white is a part white part grey color, which I love. These pieces ( I got the bookshelf and tv stand) are not huge, I intentionally wanted pieces that didn't take up my entire living room. I would definitely recommend. P.S. Anyone who complains these are like assembling IKEA furniture, has clearly never assembled anything from IKEA.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but a lot of damage
customer_reviews.text: The drawer is completely busted, which I didn't know until the entire this was put together. Hate it when that happens because I'm not going to disassemble and attempt to put it back in the box for return. There are a several areas where there are large gouges or damage to the 'wood', but they are all in places that you can't see with the way I have the desk set up so I'll keep it. It does LOOK really nice, but just disappointed there is so much damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: This desk can mostly preassembled which was nice and easy enough for my 14 year old son to put together. You only had to screw in the legs and the cross bar, that was it. Very nice sturdy and works well. Had a couple issues where the hole was too big for one of the screws and a piece of wood under the desk was split, but in a minor spot that could be glued. All in all this was a nice piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid bench
customer_reviews.text: The bench is much nicer than the photo. Assembly is easy. One caution....once you connect the side supports to the base shelf, do not use them as an aid to lift yourself up off the floor. I did so and the support piece broke free from the base shelf. I put glue in the 2 holes, and re-inserted the 1 1/2" bolts back into the holes and waited for the glue to .dry before attaching the top. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Retired in the O.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know what to expect after reading many reviews. My particular desk was well packaged and had no damage whatsoever. Materials were more solid than I expected them to be. Assembly was about 10 minutes and very simple. Love the look of the desk. Not large, but a nice workspace. The computer in my picture is a 27 inch iMac for scale.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to put on my husband's side of the love seat. After, I assembled it; which was a little challenging because this table is very sturdy, I knew I'd be buying another one to replace the table i currently have on my side of the love seat. My husband loves the color, design and the quality of these table.....so much so, he offered to replace mine with one to match his. We would certainly recommend this table; its well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsfields

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Damaged. Such a pain in the a** when things arrive damaged. Hopefully I can just get a credit. Beautiful desk but damaged sucks. It’s such a hassle dealing with part exhanges!
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Knight

customer_reviews.title: I am in love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this maybe a month ago and decided to put it together on my own. I did struggle a bit so I would recommend having a second person assist with this. It looks beautiful and slimmer than I imagined but it works perfect for my books and random items. Of course I just ordered a second one to put on the other side of the room and I can't wait to put it together this time not alone for how long it took me the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT DESK
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk!! It fits everything I need to be able to study effectively (and then some). I love the ability to use the standing desk and the color is just perfect!! It was very easy to put together (although exceptionally heavy). I have had this for about 2 months now and I’ve never spent more time at a desk! I also really enjoy the space under the standing desk; I keep some of the books I don’t use as much under there and it keeps my desks a bit less cluttered. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute.. kidding, but it does look like something that would go in a doll house. It’s a lot smaller than the pictures lead you to believe a lot smaller. If it were six inches wider and taller. The drawer when put together you almost have to kneel to open it and look in side. But it’s very well made I’m keeping just because I like the style.
customer_reviews.author: Lockleaj

customer_reviews.title: End table too small
customer_reviews.text: The living room end table I purchased is ridiculous short and small. The only reason I’m keeping it is because it’s the closets color to my fire place. Detail is beautiful but cannot believe how small this is for an end table.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Product was great - packaging and shipping, not so much!
customer_reviews.text: The desk itself is great and was a breeze to assemble. The issue was that there was not enough protection around the item in the packaging. My desk arrived with major dents and slashes to the wood. All but two were on the back/bottom. The two areas on the top of the desk where wood was removed; I had to just cover. Given the need to work from home, it was not worth it to me to try to ship it back and wait another few weeks for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Had to replace top 3 times before we got one that wasnt damaged!
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and really piss poor packaging!!! Had to try 3 times before we had one salvageable top!!! cams on original were crap and literally crumbled. If this was real wood i could have sanded down areas of scratching and stained the top, but no, this is vener. No possible to way to fix and the packaging does not meet ups standards! way to high of a price for such poor quality
customer_reviews.author: cindy tripp

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy well made
customer_reviews.text: Its a beautiful well made bench. Was easy to assemble all that is left to do is the two sides and bottom shelf.. They connect easy then attach to the bottom. Im 63 and assembled it. Now i need a cushion. : )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is a very sturdy yet not too bulky piece. The only thing I don't love about it is that the color is green grey not grey grey. So I was a bit disappointed. I bought the matching L-shaped combo sitting/standing desk as well. My home office looks great. I matched the set with a Khaki sofa and a brown office chair.
customer_reviews.author: Elle T.

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself much frustration and disappointment; the best thing about this was returning it. Cheaply made. I’ll be nice and just say, don’t buy this. It looks good but ...... 🤮
customer_reviews.author: TeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, cheap screws
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color but cheap screws. 3 of the screw heads came off of the hooks....literally, screw is in and head is gone so hook will not stay and big bump where the screw is. I am a small woman and I was able to put this whole thing together by myself in about 2 hrs. It looks great despite not having hooks, but just like everything, you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Extensive damage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality of wood, looks sturdy and and like it would be a beautiful piece of furniture IF it weren’t delivered not once but TWICE damaged- and I mean pieces that were smashed. It’s also a 119lb box so it’s a hassle to drag in and out of my house to the porch and schedule a UPS pick up to send back. I do not recommend unless you are up for the back and forth headache until you get one that isn’t damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous when I read some of the reviews, but I could not be happier with this desk! Very easy to put together (4 large pieces and 8 screws total).
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Came broken, drawer wasn’t assembled correctly.
customer_reviews.text: The middle board in the back for wires came cracked. The drawer came already assembled and one wheel keeps falling out, so the drawer doesn’t open and close properly. This piece could be great, I don’t understand why so many are receiving it broken. Or why the drawer wasn’t assembled correctly. It’s beautiful and heavy, but not worth the money to deal with broken pieces and having to return and chance getting another broken piece.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Thanner

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice desk for the money. My husband loves it. Unfortunately the drawer was damaged badly during shipping but we still kept it because the seller compensated us enough to pay for the repair. Beware it scratches very easily so invest in a large writing pad if you intend to use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Long Island Mom

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT, came damaged, was more brown than gray and looked nothing like the picture. I was very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great product looks beautiful great craftmenship. Assembly was not the easiest but with two people it was a breeze. I recomend using good tools and follow the directions they are laid out well
customer_reviews.author: Troy Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Company’s customer service stinks. Item not shipped well.
customer_reviews.text: One of the boxes came with a hole puncture in it and the drawer ended up getting broken as a result. Amazon would not replace and we were required to deal with manufacturer which would not help either. I love the look of the desk and the standup section works well. It would be perfect if the drawer had not been damaged. Fortunately it can’t be seen on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk for my daughter's room. Love the rustic look and sturdiness. Great piece of furniture for the price. So happy I purchased it!!!! Super easy to put together! Three steps and you are done......
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Belluche

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Probably the worst thing I've ever had to build . Stay far far away , came damaged in several spots . The instructions arnt clear at all and has a ton of those twist caps that screws go into . Complete garbage
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Cute bench, not a gray color as in title
customer_reviews.text: We really like the looks of this item but would have preferred a longer bench. Also it is described as "gray" but is brown, nary a hint of gray.
customer_reviews.author: DWD

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk, but wish it was actually a gray color, it's more on the light brown side
customer_reviews.author: Shineyshine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice !
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality stand. We are using it for a TV out in a 3 season room. Love the wood. Great color and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie VanDeVusse

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely what I've been looking for. It was fairly easy to assemble and is decent quality for the price. Everyone who visits my home gives me a compliment on it. I would recommend this if you're looking for a farmhouse styled coat rack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This piece of furniture is built very sturdy and looks great in my entryway
customer_reviews.text: This piece of furniture is built very sturdy and looks great in my entryway. I should have checked the measurements because it is actually smaller than I thought. Also, don't plan on using this as a bench to sit on. It only holds up to 100lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Renee McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Caution to those who order.
customer_reviews.text: Product came destroyed out of box. The laminate is not of great quality. The long desk part is cracked in three places upon pulling out of box
customer_reviews.author: ashtyn

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: This desk is really lovely. Very sturdy, looks very nice, and was easy to assemble - it comes mostly assembled, there are just four pieces that you have to put together, so I was able to do it by myself. It looks great and I'm very glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Desk
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this desk. Super easy to assemble, lots of desk space, I haven't used the stand up portion much, but it is awesome to have and for the price you couldn't find another stand-up desk option that even compares to this desk. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality desk
customer_reviews.text: Quality of this desk is great. I was very surprised at how low the price was for such a good quality desk
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Condition
customer_reviews.text: Drawer had to be repaired it would not stay on track.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Desk is beautiful! Worked perfect in my home and I assembled it alll on my own!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: and I loved the look of it
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me for my birthday, and I loved the look of it! Problem is, the quality is not great. The bottom left side where the shelves attach to the wood panel split when we screwed them together. I'm very disappointed that it's already cracked after a month!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected! It is really heavy duty to last. The color was perfect and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The desk arrived in good shape through FedEx. Easy to assemble. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: April M Leitner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this table! It matches our other pieces and looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the desk was a little disappointed that it had a dent on the top of it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Minor damage (distressed spots) to certain pieces of the wood but overall great quality. Super easy assemble
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: Seriously,easiest desk I've ever put together. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: c. strong

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, very hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This piece arrived broken. It was also very hard to assemble. I ordered a matching piece that was a breeze to assemble. I had to resort to a hammer to get the shelves to align with the pegs. The hardware was scattered throughout the box, two shelves were broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the entryway bench is beautiful and solid wood
customer_reviews.text: the entryway bench is beautiful and solid wood; however, is on the small side. I wanted a bench to stored some of our shoes, but I can only fit 3 pairs of shoes. I am going to keep but I wish it was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Mily

customer_reviews.title: It does look nice though.
customer_reviews.text: Its quite a bit taller than 26". As previous reviewers stated, one of the screw holes for the top didn't line up properly, but the other 5 did, so I'm not worried about it. For some reason they place a warning sticker right on the top which you can't peel off very well and leaves a sticky mess on the wood. Gonna have to use some sort of GooGone or something to get it off. Hope it doesn't mar the finish. It does look nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty. Not super easy to put together, but manageable. Wouldn't want to have to pick it up to move it though, put it together and leave it in that spot unless you're a weightlifter!
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and currently using this desk for remote learning. It was EXTREMELY easy to assemble (only had to screw in legs). It’s also very sturdy and looks great! I’ve had lots of compliments on it. One of the best purchases I’ve ever made from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne S Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk.
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk..wish it was a bit longer/wider..Good color...not too difficult to put together.. Delivery service was poor..left this huge package at the apartment office..had to get it to my apartment with great difficulty
customer_reviews.author: K K

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret buying
customer_reviews.text: Shipping and delivery was very fast. Well worth buying very sturdy desk and modern looking. Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Broken on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: This product is beautiful but came broken at the bottom. We wood glued it because I don’t want to take them time to put it back and ship it
customer_reviews.author: Candice Swatzell

customer_reviews.title: Product Disintegrates  during Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality bolts and shelving. I had to buy my own bolts at lowes and brackets to hold up the shelving. Although a beautiful piece, i would not recommend it. Super cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: APG

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but veneer is fragile.
customer_reviews.text: The design is great and very practical. I gave it three stars because veneer was cracked or broke off and cracks easily.
customer_reviews.author: Just Jean

customer_reviews.title: End tables
customer_reviews.text: They are very sturdy and match a bookcase and tv stand we bought.
customer_reviews.author: lori Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk, but product arrived damaged which is very frustrating. Too big of a hastle to return. I would expect better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: aidyl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Bench
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bench, ordered it for my Foyer area and it was just perfect. very well structured, drawer is a little flimsy but overall I'm very happy with this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Raimundi

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it personally
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it personally. Returned it. I had to pay postage around $80. It's heavy. Make sure you want this before you buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith J. Dusch

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee table! Wish it was an inch lower, but the look is fantastic- looks like a solid piece of quality furniture. Drawer is much larger than anticipated and opens easily and smoothly!
customer_reviews.author: B. Argast

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful functional desk!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful desk! At a price point we wanted. It’s standing up wonderful to the everyday use of muiliple people. Very comfortable hight and functional. I would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over all its ok feel like it is slightly overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Ikea quality and craftsmenship. Smells very strong of chemicals/ staining. Over all its ok feel like it is slightly overpriced. Not real wood. Heavy.
customer_reviews.author: john schneider

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is heavier than expected, but still easy to assemble. Very sturdy, yet elegant. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda W.

customer_reviews.title: Worst item to build!
customer_reviews.text: This item came with manufacturer issues! Half the pre drilled holes were not the correct depth creating havoc the pieces did not line up so could not lock cam locks! This is a heavy item it should be held together with cam locks and poorly drilled screws. Completely dissatisfied. Gorgeous wood but horrible assembly and poor carpentry!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Shelves crack while assembling it. Even though you can get replacement shelves don't move the unit after you assemble it as the shelves will crack and break. Don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Patchin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never left an Amazon review before after ordering 100s of items...but these desks have blown me away. They are beautiful, so simple to assemble, and extremely sturdy. I bought them on a whim and am so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Beale

customer_reviews.title: Love the rustic look!
customer_reviews.text: This is used at my backdoor. I put 3 wicker baskets on the shelf for a little extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Hladik

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, doesn't look like real wood. Looks more like a vinyl or rubbery kind of polymer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited to get this but when we ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this but when we opened it we didn't even take it completely out of the box because the first piece had broken drawers and the veneer was peeling all the way off. We sent it back and bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice desk!!
customer_reviews.text: Very modern, beautiful and sturdy desk. Super quick and easy to put together. Top drawer is a nice feature for smaller item storage. Great product for great price!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk but only after five were delivered. Four were damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Instructions could have been more clear but overall was good. I LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together in a hour or so. Instructions could have been more clear but overall was good. I LOVE it, I was unsure about the color (I got the white) but I love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received product with shelve damage and no assembly parts at all. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Dyar

customer_reviews.title: Drawer slides don’t work well
customer_reviews.text: The desk drawer doesn’t slide very good at all. My son had a hard time getting it open to get his school supplies.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kaness

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice but color is not as shown. more of a red coloring
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: manufactured poor
customer_reviews.text: the pieces that were put together were not alined properly so after putting it all together it wouldn't fit the last screws and the pieces to put it together where not labeled right, so I spent 6 hours, just to find out I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: kathy Pawling

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time &
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! I should have listened to so many other reviews. The product came damaged. I opened one side of the box & immediately found 2 pieces broken. I didn't bother pulling it out of the box. Waste of time & money
customer_reviews.author: SHELLY SPERINO

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Finish slightly damaged on arrival. It serves its purpose for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Buckman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this piece fits great in space and looks amazing. Very strudyand has held up well
customer_reviews.author: Megan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Worst product I ever bought on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The product has CAM locks that crumbled when you tried to use them. The 8 that didn’t crumble ... just didn’t work. The top had a huge crack in it. Now I have to figure out how I return this huge piece of furniture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love grey white color
customer_reviews.text: Amazing color like grey /white mix so pretty matches my marble
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: order this desk for my husbands study, and it was perfect! wood was beautiful and its super easy to put together! i will be buying other items like this in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: What we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Hold up well, looks great. very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dulc6

customer_reviews.title: PIECE OF CRAP
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst piece of crap i have ever bought and when I called the company they took ABSOLUTELY NO RESPONSIBILITY for the product. DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF FURNITURE!!! It is horrible!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karri Kottka

customer_reviews.title: A Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I really love it! However, assembly was difficult. Illustrations could have been a little more clear. Example: Shading for finished side would have been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great desk
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together, sturdy and looks good. My husband loves the section of desk that allows you to stand and work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I have put together dozens of pieces of furniture over the years. This is by far the worst I have ever seen!!! Directions are wrong, nothing fits right! Terrible product!
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: Scratches easily :( other than that the product is amazing, sturdy
customer_reviews.author: KBest

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was great! Super easy to put together, very sturdy and the finish looked perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Reb1458

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I used this table next to a chair in my living room. It’s the perfect size. Color is beautiful and it’s very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Tarared03

product_meta.title: Ameriwood Home Wildwood Wood Veneer Entryway Bench, Rustic Gray
product_meta.description: Style Name:Entryway Bench| Color:Rustic GrayFirst impressions are important. Wow your guests as soon as they walk in the front door with the Ameriwood Home Wildwood Wood Veneer Entryway Bench. The large lower shelf and small drawer offer storage space for shoes, keys and so much more. Two adults are recommended for proper assembly of this Bench. After assembled this Bench measures to be 18.125”h x 40”w x 15.875”d.
feature_bullets: Ameriwood Home Wildwood Wood Veneer Entryway Bench is both beautiful and practical with its rustic charm and sturdy build

The top of the bench is perfect for decorative pillows and extra seating while the lower shelf can support shoes and handbags and the hidden drawer is the perfect size for notepads, keys and other small items
This Bench seat supports up to 250 lbs
Two adults are recommended for proper assembly. Dimensions: 18.125”h x 40”w x 15.875”d. Shipping weight is approximately 60 lbs
The elegant light brown finish with gray undertones and black metal accents gives this bench a sophisticated edge

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars251 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
